#summary Building Cscope

=== Prerequisites ===

  * [http://mingw.org MinGW, MSYS, and MSYS DTK]
  * [http://cygwin.org Cygwin] with flex and bison installed
  * [http://arglist.com/regex Henry Spencer's regular expression library], version 3.8.g4 alpha
  * [http://pdcurses.sourceforge.net Public Domain Curses]


=== Details ===

  # Install MinGW, MSYS, Cygwin
  # Build and install regex library using MSYS
{{{
./configure --disable-shared --enable-static --prefix=/d/Develop/regex-spencer && make install
}}}
  # Build PDCurses using MinGW
{{{
mingw32-make -f mingwin32.mak DEBUG=N DLL=N
}}}
  # Edit variables RX, CURSES, LEX, YACC in cscope Makefile
  # make with MinGW or MSYS
{{{
mingw32-make
}}}
